mapper.select: SELECT FOODS, ALCOHOL_CIGARETTE,CLOTHES, UTILITY_BILL,HOUSEWARES, HEALTH, TRANSPORTATION, TELEPHONE,ENTERTAINMENT, EDUCATION,TRAVEL, ETC, NON_CON_EXPENDITURE FROM aws.DATA WHERE DATA_SEQ='1'
